mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, WEIGHT, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, SAVENUM, OPER1, OPER2, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSITE, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTNAMEEN, PICTUREURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 from db_gift where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, WEIGHT, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, SAVENUM, OPER1, OPER2, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSITE, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTNAMEEN, PICTUREURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3 from db_gift
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , PRODUCTID , WEIGHT , COSTPRICE , SELLPRICE , SAVENUM , OPER1 , OPER2 , SHOPTYPE , SHOPTYPEID , EBAYITEMID , EBAYSITE , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , OPER , OPERTIME , CORPID , OPENFLAG , CATEGORYID , CATEGORY , CREATEOPER , CREATETIME , PRODUCTNAME , PRODUCTNAMEEN , PICTUREURL , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SAVENUM = #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER1 = #{oper1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER2 = #{oper2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPE = #{shoptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYSITE = #{ebaysite,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAMEEN = #{productnameen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PICTUREURL = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,

SHOPTYPE = #{shoptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EBAYSITE = #{ebaysite,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
PRODUCTNAMEEN = #{productnameen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
PICTUREURL = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
